name: Tanks (itch) (jozko12121)
description:
This Game Is About Tank

It s a 1v1 Tipe Of Game

Where You Are Controlling A Blue Tank And Your Friend Or Brother Or Sister Are Shooting Each Other

Controls

Player 1: Forward Is W

                    Backward Is S

                   Left Is A

                  Right Is D

                Fire Is Space

Player 2: Forward Is UP-Arrow

                   Backward Is Down-Arrow

                   Left Is Left-Arrow

                  Right Is Right-Arrow

                 Fire Is Enter
